subject: feat: add settings panel for consolidated configuration
body:
Move all settings into a dedicated slide-out panel accessible via gear
icon in header:
- View Level (from filter sidebar)
- Privacy Mode toggle (from header icon)
- Timezone selector (from Activity tab)
- Work Hours configuration (from Activity tab)

This cleans up the UI by separating data filters from configuration
settings, and provides a consistent location for all dashboard options.
